definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: While thiol method was simple but much more time costing for reaction.
sentences.chinese: 巯基法操作较为简单，但所需的反应时间较长。

sentences.english: Advantages of the process are higher yield, simple procedure, shorter reaction time, non-corrosive, non-pollution, etc.
sentences.chinese: 该工艺产率高，反应时间短，无腐蚀无污染。

sentences.english: The response time means the time responsed in liquid medium.
sentences.chinese: 反应时间系指在液体介质内。

sentences.english: Higher temperatures and long reaction time made thermal initiation more evidently.
sentences.chinese: 升高温度和延长反应时间使得热聚合更为显著。

sentences.english: The method shows the advantages of Iower energy, shorter reaction time, higher yield of product and easyer control.
sentences.chinese: 其特点是反应时间短，能耗低，得率高，便于控制。

sentences.english: The concentration of substrate was nearly linear with the reaction time.
sentences.chinese: 底物浓度与反应时间存在近似的线性关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion With the TSD hour prolonging, visual reaction time of normal persons gradually prolong.
sentences.chinese: 结论随睡眠剥夺时间的延长正常人视觉反应时间延长。

sentences.english: And chalcogenide allows for "femtosecond response time" (now that's fast).
sentences.chinese: 硫族化物可以允许“飞秒反应时间”。

sentences.english: In order for the severe injuries to survive, the response time becomes very critical.
sentences.chinese: 为了能够让重伤员得以生还，反应时间变得至关重要。

sentences.english: We're going to compare the data on response time and behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我们会比较反应时间和行为方式。

sentences.english: As reaction time was prolonged, the lengths of the peptides were increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着反应时间的延长，所形成的肽链的长度也会增加。

definition: to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
buffer/to cushion/to adjust to sharp changes
to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
